ComicInfo.Summary:
SERIES PREMIERE!
ANGELICA BLACKSTONE is half-Greek god, half-vampire, and she's pissed!
When she is brought back from the dead and given a new lease on life by monster hunter Liesel Van Helsing, Angelica joins a gang of Viking vampire junkies living in the underbelly of New York City. But she has a hell of an ax to grind with her absentee father, Hades, who she blames for her death. All hell is about to break loose!
This March, the newest badass hero arrives in the Grimm Universe... Angelica Blackstone is the Hellchild.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Edgar Salazar & Michael Bartolo | 1 | B | Cover B | Harvey Tolibao & Jorge Cortes | 2 | C | Cover C | Mike Krome | 3 | D | Cover D | Jason Metcalf & Ivan Nunes | 4 | E | WonderCon Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 500 | Eric Basaldua & Nei Ruffino | 5 | F | WonderCon Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Eric Basaldua & Nei Ruffino | Missing | G | ZENBOX Baseball Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 300 | Eric Basaldua & Nei Ruffino | 6 |
